messages.content: Saturn in the 7th house and the subject of past lives?

Saturn in the 7th house indicates a strong emphasis on the past and the memories from past life experiences. It can also indicate a need to understand the lessons learned from past lives and to integrate those lessons into the present. This can be especially true for those born under the influence of Saturn, who may have experienced past traumas, difficulties, or challenges in their lives.
In terms of the subject of past lives, Saturn in the 7th house can indicate a strong connection to past life experiences, either from this life or from past lives. This can include a strong connection to past life traumas, as well as a strong desire to learn from past experiences and to integrate the lessons learned.
Overall, Saturn in the 7th house can indicate a strong connection to the past and to the lessons learned from past life experiences. It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past traumas and to integrate the lessons learned.

Saturn in the 2nd house indicates a strong emphasis on material possessions, values, and material success. It can also indicate a strong desire for security, stability, and a sense of belonging. This can include a strong emphasis on career, finances, and material possessions.
In terms of the subject of past lives, Saturn in the 2nd house can indicate a strong emphasis on the lessons learned from past life experiences, including any past life traumas, lessons learned, or karmic debts. It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past life experiences and to integrate the lessons learned.
Overall, Saturn in the 2nd house can indicate a strong focus on material possessions, values, and material success. It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past life experiences and to integrate those lessons into the present.

Saturn in the 3rd house indicates a strong emphasis on the lessons learned from past life experiences, including any past life traumas, lessons learned, or karmic debts. It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past life experiences and to integrate the lessons learned into the present.
In terms of the subject of past lives, Saturn in the 3rd house can indicate a strong emphasis on the lessons learned from past life experiences, including any past life traumas, lessons learned, or karmic debts. It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past life experiences and to integrate the lessons learned.

It can also indicate a strong desire to learn from past life experiences and to integrate those lessons into the present.
